parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. Use the value returned in the previous response in the next request to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: quickResponseSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information about the quick responses.

nested_items.name: channels
nested_items.description: The Amazon Connect contact channels this quick response applies to. The supported contact channel types include Chat.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: The media type of the quick response content.
Use application/x.quickresponse;format=plain for quick response written in plain text.
Use application/x.quickresponse;format=markdown for quick response written in richtext.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the quick response was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the quick response.

nested_items.name: isActive
nested_items.description: Whether the quick response is active.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who last updated the quick response data.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the quick response summary was last modified.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the quick response.

nested_items.name: quickResponseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the quick response.

nested_items.name: quickResponseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the quick response.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The resource status of the quick response.
(string) ---
(string) ---
